full_threads.body: @manuel here's the follow up task, thanks!

Hey Rika,

I just caught up with the client and Dr Pant has asked for a couple of updates.

Here is a screen share: https://www.loom.com/share/43afdbd6e6684e70b620c9cb27163f46

1) Remove Dr Pant profile insert on Patient Registration and Shoulder Score forms/pages.
2) Bring 'Title' into the same line as Given Name and Surname.
3) Add link to text 'PDF Registration Form that allows client to print and download PDF form (only for the registration form)
4) Create a page for the Shoulder Score form (positioned below the 'Registration Form" in main menu
5) "Next of Kin' field to be split into:
Next of Kin / Mobile phone / Relationship to Patient (3 seperate fields)
6) Introduce 'email consent'. An example we can use for inspiration can be found here: https://drpeterwalker.com.au/patient-registration/

Many thanks!

Chris



Chris Paradowkski
Partnerships Manager

Phone: 1300 072 134

full_threads.body:
‌
Hi Rica,

Can I please have your assistance with the following tasks for https://sydneyshoulderunit.com.au/

Home page:

1) Association logos - Adjust the logo size of "Souther Highlands Private Hospital" Dr Sushil has added this one himself).

2) Add hyperlinks to association logos
FRACS https://www.surgeons.org/
FAORTHA https://aoa.org.au/
Sydney Sports Med https://www.ssmc.com.au/practitioners/sushil-pant.html
St Lukes https://www.slc.org.au/doctor/dr-sushil-pant/
North Shore Private https://www.northshoreprivate.com.au/Our-Doctors/Specialists/north-shore-private-hospital/orthopaedics/107222/dr-sushil-pant
St George Private https://www.stgeorgeprivate.com.au/Our-Doctors/Specialists/kareena-private-hospital/orthopaedic-surgery---shoulder/107210/dr-sushil-pant
Karren Private https://www.stgeorgeprivate.com.au/Our-Doctors/Specialists/kareena-private-hospital/orthopaedic-surgery---shoulder/107210/dr-sushil-pant
Southern Highlands https://www.southernhighlandsprivate.com.au/Our-Doctors/Specialists/southern-highlands-private-hospital/orthopaedic-surgery---shoulder/107200/dr-sushil-pant
St Vincent's https://www.svph.org.au/hospitals/east-melbourne
Castlereagh Imaging https://www.casimaging.com.au/
AAOS https://www.aaos.org/
AMA https://www.amansw.com.au/

3) Footer - Link location addresses in the footer.

4) Add "Patient Registration From" to main menu above "Before your consultation"

5) Patient registration form - Change from PDF style in new tab, to on page styled like the other forms
- Adjust fields to copy/replicate: https://www.drmarcuschia.com/patients/registration/
- Include a "what's this?" Function for medicare card
- Change field "phone" to "mobile phone"
- Remove brackets for phone number field (see below screen shot)



6) Shoulder Score Form - Change from PDF style to on page styled like the other on page forms. All fields to remain unchanged.

Thanks!!
Chris Paradowski
Partnerships Manager

Phone: 1300 072 134
